Description: Body sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice with part of cul; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion to right (forelegs with trace of chest remaining; added red on one foreleg); elaborate rosettes, part of one rising rosette and trace of one rising triangle as filling ornament; below on cul, guilloche pattern between dilute bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0448) (phase 2)
